messages.messageBody:
well, I'm nowhere near there, but I welcome you
anyway. Hope you enjoy the list and gain support from
it. I know I have. Nice to meet you.
-Bobbie

messages.subject: Greetings from North Carolina!
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings! I m a new subscriber to this group and would like to introduce myself and my family!  I m the mom to five delightful children ages 9 months to 9
messages.messageBody:
Greetings!

I'm a new subscriber to this group and would like to introduce myself
and my family! I'm the mom to five delightful children ages 9 months
to 9 years. They all enjoy reading, games, arts/crafts, science, animals/nature,
and most anything physical. My husband is with the local hospice. He
enjoys reading, computer "hearts", and is working on a screenplay. I
enjoy decorating, gardening, fixing up the house, scrapbooking, reading,
and staying home with the children! We've only just recently relocated
to Albemarle, NC and would welcome the opportunity to meet others who
may be nearby...Stanly Co., Cabarrus, Montgomery. I'm looking forward
to sharing with all of you!

Nancy Barcus
Albemarle, NC
